6301.name: The Webbed Entrance
6301.description:
Sticky, sticky, sticky! The ground is cluttered with leaves, decayed
remains of webbed crickets, beetle, rats, dogs, and even humans. You
begin to wonder about what lies ahead. The air is damp here, and even
the little light that shines through the canopy seems to be absorbed
into the webbing. The sounds of city life echo around. The smell of
smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: An open path leads to The Webby Passage

south.description: The water flows toward Up In The Tree

6302.name: The Webby Passage
6302.description:
The passage opens to that footing here is very good, almost too good.
The limbs are coated with cobwebs and seem unusually strong for tree
branches. Paths lead in four directions. The eastward path goes down a
bit. The air is fresh and clean. Tall grass sways in a gentle breeze.

north.description: An open path leads to The Webby Passage

east.description: An open path leads to Beneath The Busy Path

south.description: The cobblestones lead to The Webbed Entrance

west.description: An open path leads to The Wasp Hive

6303.name: The Wasp Hive
6303.description:
Drones scuttle about in this room. The cells on the walls are honeycomb
in shape and many of the maggots and wasps you see have fang-marks on
their bodies. You sense some order in their markings. The air is fresh
and clean. The ground is soft underfoot.

east.description: An open path leads to The Webby Passage

6304.name: The Webby Passage
6304.description:
Another webby passage, all sticky and wet. Tiny ballooning spiders fill
the air. It seems that these young ones are newborns. The air is fresh
and clean. The ground is soft underfoot.

east.description: An open path leads to Beneath The Busy Path

south.description: An open path leads to The Webby Passage

6305.name: Beneath The Busy Path
6305.description:
You here the sounds of crawling arachnids above. The rhythms of the
footsteps suggest a primitive order in there movement. The light seems
brighter upwards. The ground is soft underfoot. Tall grass sways in a
gentle breeze.

west.description: An open path leads to The Webby Passage

up.description: An open path leads to On The Busy Path

6306.name: On The Busy Path
6306.description:
Spiders, spiders, everywhere! It is almost ant-like in efficiency with
one big difference. The spiders here are carrying ant-corpses, as well
as rats, wolves, and humans. The open sky stretches overhead. The air is
fresh and clean.

south.description: An open path leads to On The Busy Path

down.description: An open path leads to Beneath The Busy Path

6307.name: On The Busy Path
6307.description:
Spiders, spiders, everywhere! It is almost ant-like in efficiency with
one big difference. The spiders here are carrying ant-corpses, as well
as cats, wolves, and humans. Wildflowers dot the landscape. The open sky
stretches overhead.

north.description: An open path leads to On The Busy Path

east.description: An open path leads to On The Busy Path

6308.name: On The Busy Path
6308.description:
Spiders, spiders, everywhere! It is almost ant-like in efficiency with
one big difference. The spiders here are carrying ant-corpses, as well
as cats, dogs, and humans. Wildflowers dot the landscape. Tall grass
sways in a gentle breeze.

north.description: An open path leads to On The Busy Path

east.description: An open path leads to On The Busy Path

south.description: An open path leads to Beneath The Busy Path

west.description: An open path leads to A Split In The Path

6309.name: A Split In The Path
6309.description:
As always, there is a split in the road. One road is strewn with cricket
feelers. The other is well-kept and suitable for smooth travelling. The
webbing that was prevalent in earlier rooms is almost non-existant now.
The open sky stretches overhead. The ground is soft underfoot.

north.description: An open path leads to A Fuzzy Tree Limb

east.description: An open path leads to On The Busy Path

south.description: An open path leads to The Webless Path

6310.name: A Fuzzy Tree Limb
6310.description:
The area is a 'fuzzy' tree limb. Interesting, since the branches seem to
have 'hairs' sprouting from its bark. As you look closer you see
millions of aphids covering each limb. The open sky stretches overhead.
The ground is soft underfoot.

south.description: An open path leads to A Split In The Path

west.description: An open path leads to The Tree Trunk

6311.name: The Tree Trunk
6311.description:
You feel that you can rest here safely. There is evidence of webbing
here, but it is of a finer quality. The open sky stretches overhead.
Wildflowers dot the landscape.

east.description: An open path leads to A Fuzzy Tree Limb

south.description: An open path leads to The Tree Lair Entrance

6312.name: The Tree Lair Entrance
6312.description:
It seems the inhabitant of this place does not web her victims, as
evidenced by the remains before. The area is cluttered with
desiccated corpses, apparently bitten but unwebbed, and drained of their
life juices. Wildflowers dot the landscape. Tall grass sways in a gentle
breeze.

north.description: An open path leads to The Tree Trunk

west.description: An open path leads to The Wolf Spider Lair

6313.name: The Wolf Spider Lair
6313.description:
Very dark, as all lairs of spiders are. Not much of furnishings save an
exit. The wolf spider keeps no corpses here, but rather throws them out
at her leisure. Wildflowers dot the landscape. Tall grass sways in a
gentle breeze.

east.description: An open path leads to The Tree Lair Entrance

6320.name: The Webless Path
6320.description:
Strange. No webbing here. In fact, no sounds whatsoever. The path
continues northward, where you find that you may have to tightrope your
way across a ravine. The air is fresh and clean. Wildflowers dot the
landscape.

north.description: An open path leads to A Split In The Path

west.description: An open path leads to Above The Ravine

6321.name: Above The Ravine
6321.description:
Stranger still. Your feet get a real firm grip on the spiderline. You
are above a deep ravine. This line connects you between two trees. Below
Visible is a prismatic web with lots of animal bones caught in it: some
bear and small deer bones in fact. No human skeletons are visible (yet).
The open sky stretches overhead. The air is fresh and clean.

east.description: An open path leads to The Webless Path

south.description: An open path leads to The Web Forest

down.description: An open path leads to The Rainbow Web

6322.name: The Rainbow Web
6322.description:
This is the rainbow web -- each strand, each link, a hue of violently
sharp colors and contrasts. The resident here seems to have a command of
light as well. Wildflowers dot the landscape. The ground is soft
underfoot.

up.description: An open path leads to Above The Ravine

6323.name: The Web Forest
6323.description:
The trees here take on a different appearance -- they are not trees
anymore, but disjointed make-shift silken made shafts, sticky to the
touch, and webby in texture. This is another world it would appear. Tall
grass sways in a gentle breeze. The air is fresh and clean.

north.description: An open path leads to Above The Ravine

down.description: An open path leads to The Slave Pit

6324.name: The Slave Pit
6324.description:
The entrance opens to the slave pit. A voice blares in the distance,
'Get back to work, maggots!' Rails upon rails of mined gold and silver
clutter the trail beneath you. Wildflowers dot the landscape. Tall grass
sways in a gentle breeze.

north.description: An open path leads to The Tether Path

up.description: An open path leads to The Web Forest

6325.name: The Tether Path
6325.description:
Another tether path just like the rest of them. Surprisingly well-lit by
the golden orbs that hang from the sides, Visible is the paths become
finer and finer in quality. The open sky stretches overhead. Wildflowers
dot the landscape.

east.description: An open path leads to A Road Crossing

west.description: An open path leads to The Slave Pit

6326.name: A Road Crossing
6326.description:
Another shifty little strand of webs, almost ethereal in nature. The
open sky stretches overhead. Tall grass sways in a gentle breeze. The
open terrain stretches out, grass swaying in the breeze. The sky hangs
vast overhead.

west.description: An open path leads to The Tether Path

up.description: An open path leads to A Leader Strand

6327.name: A Leader Strand
6327.description:
This strand is weightier, more sturdy. It shimmers as you step on it.
The area is definitely not in the Midgaardian realms anymore. Just where
The area is you can't tell. It feels like you're moving through ether.
You can still get back down to more surer lands. The ground is soft
underfoot. Tall grass sways in a gentle breeze.

north.description: An open path leads to The Entrance Of The Ethereal Web

down.description: An open path leads to A Road Crossing

6328.name: The Entrance Of The Ethereal Web
6328.description:
This is the entrance to ethereal web. Flickering in and out, in and out,
each strand reveals a different hue from black to green to blue. The
open sky stretches overhead. The air is fresh and clean.

south.description: An open path leads to The Base Of The Web

6330.name: The Young Wormkin's Crib
6330.description:
A playpen of sorts, with maggots of wasps and other baby vermin lying
about. You feel that humans have been played with here too, and eaten
later. You sense that the maker of this place has an appetite for dragon
meat, and uses this room as a breeding area. The ground is soft
underfoot. The open sky stretches overhead.

up.description: An open path leads to The Base Of The Web

6331.name: The Base Of The Web
6331.description:
Large strands connect at this point. The node shimmers and flickers
within the ether. You see many flying creatures -- insects, pegasi, and
dragon wormkins -- navigate the dangerous passages of the web. Exits go
in many directions. The open sky stretches overhead. Wildflowers dot the
landscape.

north.description: An open path leads to The Young Wormkin's Crib

east.description: An open path leads to Through The Trees

south.description: An open path leads to Above The Clouds

west.description: An open path leads to On A Cloud

6332.name: Through The Trees
6332.description:
This part of the web intersects through the branches of some trees.
Various leaves and other debris that the many drones have not picked up
yet lie here. Tall grass sways in a gentle breeze. Wildflowers dot the
landscape.

east.description: An open path leads to The Base Of The Web

south.description: An open path leads to A Link In The Ethereal Web

west.description: An open path leads to Above The Clouds

6333.name: Above The Clouds
6333.description:
Visible is all of Midgaard in this ethereal web. Many of the larger
dragons that do wish to fly seem to fly away from the sticky strands of
the web. The air is fresh and clean. Wildflowers dot the landscape.

east.description: An open path leads to The Base Of The Web

south.description: An open path leads to On A Cloud

west.description: An open path leads to A Link In The Ethereal Web

6334.name: On A Cloud
6334.description:
This cloud is rather thick in consistency. You suddenly realize this is
not a typical cloud, but it might be the nest of an aerial creature. The
ground is soft underfoot. Wildflowers dot the landscape.

down.description: An open path leads to The Base Of The Web

6335.name: A Link In The Ethereal Web
6335.description:
This is another link in the ethereal web. Various creatures seem to get
caught (or hypnotized) by its sticky strands. Wildflowers dot the
landscape. The ground is soft underfoot.

east.description: An open path leads to The Tenuous Strand

west.description: An open path leads to The Base Of The Web

6336.name: The Tenuous Strand
6336.description:
Very windy here since it goes up into the sky somewhat. Still, it is
safe enough to move around. Tall grass sways in a gentle breeze. The air
is fresh and clean.

south.description: An open path leads to The Elder Wormkin's Room

west.description: An open path leads to Another Tree Limb

down.description: An open path leads to The Base Of The Web

6340.name: The Elder Wormkin's Room
6340.description:
A more mature wormkin it seems resides here. Various tomes of arcane
lore clutter the area, along with shards of armor and weaponry.
Wildflowers dot the landscape. The ground is soft underfoot.

down.description: An open path leads to The Base Of The Web

6341.name: Another Tree Limb
6341.description:
Once again the web crosses another tree limb. To the side you see the
possible entrance to another creature's lair. The air is fresh and
clean. Wildflowers dot the landscape.

east.description: An open path leads to The Bird Spider's Lair

south.description: An open path leads to On A Cloud

west.description: An open path leads to A Link In The Ethereal Web

6342.name: The Bird Spider's Lair
6342.description:
This is a big game hunter among most spiders. Crushed jewels and weapons
suggest the inhabitant must have powerful jaws. Beware! Tall grass sways
in a gentle breeze. The air is fresh and clean.

down.description: An open path leads to The Base Of The Web

6345.name: A Link In The Ethereal Web
6345.description:
This is another link in the ethereal web. Various creatures seem to get
caught (or hypnotized) by its sticky strands. The open sky stretches
overhead. The ground is soft underfoot.

south.description: An open path leads to The Ki-Rin Chamber

west.description: An open path leads to The Quiet Tree Top

up.description: An open path leads to A Link In The Ethereal Web

6346.name: The Quiet Tree Top
6346.description:
This is a quiet tree top. Downwards Visible is a familiar path that may
lead back to Midgaard. Tall grass sways in a gentle breeze. The ground
is soft underfoot.

east.description: An open path leads to A Link In The Ethereal Web

west.description: An open path leads to On The Web

down.description: The water flows toward Up In The Tree

6347.name: On The Web
6347.description:
RRRRRRRRRRROOOOOOOOOOOOOAAAAAAAAAAAAAARR! You hear the roar of a
powerful beast. Dragon, you think. You shiver in your boots as you
tiptoe along this section of the web. The open sky stretches overhead.
The air is fresh and clean.

east.description: An open path leads to The Quiet Tree Top

south.description: An open path leads to A Link In The Ethereal Web

down.description: An open path leads to The Base Of The Web

6350.name: The Ki-Rin Chamber
6350.description:
A wise ki-rin was entrapped here many years ago. It is from her that the
ruler of this realm draws magical strength. The ground is soft
underfoot. Wildflowers dot the landscape.

north.description: An open path leads to On The Web

6355.name: A Link In The Ethereal Web
6355.description:
This is another link in the ethereal web. Various creatures seem to get
caught (or hypnotized) by its sticky strands. To the north you sense the
heavy breathing of a fiery animal. The air is fresh and clean.
Wildflowers dot the landscape.

north.description: An open path leads to Yevaud's Lair

south.description: An open path leads to A Link In The Ethereal Web

6360.name: Yevaud's Lair
6360.description:
Yevaud, the Usurper of Midgaard, resides here. A voice cries out,
'BEWARE, the Usurper of Midgaard lives here! FLEE while you can!' But
even Yevaud has his master... or so you deduce. The air is fresh and
clean. The open sky stretches overhead.

south.description: An open path leads to A Link In The Ethereal Web

6365.name: A Link In The Ethereal Web
6365.description:
This is another link in the ethereal web. Various creatures seem to get
caught (or hypnotized) by its sticky strands. A single spider line lies
to the north, while ghastly seemings are due southward. The grim
entrance of Arachnos' Lair is downward. The ground is soft underfoot.
Wildflowers dot the landscape.

north.description: An open path leads to The Single Spider Line

east.description: An open path leads to The Base Of The Web

south.description: An open path leads to The Entrance To The Donjonkeep

down.description: An open path leads to The Entrance To The Arachnos' Lair

6366.name: The Entrance To The Donjonkeep
6366.description:
A dark path at the end of the web strand, you see ahead a torch lit
chamber where the souls of unavenged adventurers come and gnash their
teeth. The howls and screams of many echo through the hall ways. You see
one definite path ahead. The ground is soft underfoot. Tall grass sways
in a gentle breeze.

north.description: An open path leads to The Guardian's Room

6367.name: The Guardian's Room
6367.description:
A chair sits here for a tireless guardian who ensures that no soul
escapes. Other than that, the room is undecorated. The ground is soft
underfoot. Tall grass sways in a gentle breeze.

north.description: An open path leads to The Realm Of The Hopeless

6368.name: The Realm Of The Hopeless
6368.description:
Here you see many misguided souls who think they still live. They search
for those who killed them without warrant, and seek the free souls of
living beings to inhabit and perhaps adventure once more. The ground is
soft underfoot. The air is fresh and clean.

north.description: An open path leads to The Realm Of The Hopeless

6369.name: The Realm Of The Hopeless
6369.description:
Here you see many misguided souls who think they still live. They search
for those who killed them without warrant, and seek the free souls of
living beings to inhabit and perhaps adventure once more. The ground is
soft underfoot. The air is fresh and clean.

north.description: An open path leads to The Realm Of The Hopeless

south.description: An open path leads to The Donjonkeep

6370.name: The Donjonkeep
6370.description:
No souls have ever lived in this place. The wails of slaves and the
howls of wolves are the only way you can describe the sounds you hear.
The walls are thin and wispy. The only light you receive is the
shimmering from the strand of the ethereal web you used to get here.
Tall grass sways in a gentle breeze. The air is fresh and clean.

east.description: An open path leads to The Single Spider Line

6371.name: The Single Spider Line
6371.description:
A single spider line supports you once more. As you look across the
ether you seen a single shack up ahead with a light in the window. You
sense a great evil coming from the north and feel inclined to go back on
the ethereal web and take your chances there. Tall grass sways in a
gentle breeze. The open sky stretches overhead.

north.description: An open path leads to The Base Of The Web

south.description: An open path leads to The Single Spider Line

6372.name: The Single Spider Line
6372.description:
A single spider line supports you once more. The shack comes closer into
view and you are even more inclined to go back now. The open sky
stretches overhead. The air is fresh and clean.

north.description: An open path leads to The Single Spider Line

south.description: An open path leads to The Hermit's Corner

6373.name: The Hermit's Corner
6373.description:
Here you see evidence of a vagrant's abode. The shack is to the north,
if you dare enter it. You get the sneaking feeling you should go back
now. The skies above darken and roar with the laughter of thunder.
Wildflowers dot the landscape. The air is fresh and clean.

north.description: An open path leads to The Single Spider Line

south.description: A passage leads to Mahatma's Inescapable Trap

6380.name: Mahatma's Inescapable Trap
6380.description:
Mahatma, that silly thief, is here, and he steals everything you have.
He says 'Here, have a quick trip to the Temple of Midgaard.' He plunges
a black dagger into your back... The air is still and musty. Dust motes
drift in the stale air.

6390.name: The Entrance To The Arachnos' Lair
6390.description:
All strands inevitably lead here, the center of the web, the entrance to
Arachnos' Lair. The air is fresh and clean. The ground is soft
underfoot.

east.description: An open path leads to The Sticky Chamber

6391.name: The Sticky Chamber
6391.description:
You can still bail out since your knees are shaking from the
anticipation (or is it fear?). The sky is clear on this strand of web,
surprisingly unsticky. The strand does not vibrate like the others. A
few ballooning spiders pass by, cackling 'You're gonna die, you're gonna
fry. Good bye!' Wildflowers dot the landscape. The air is fresh and
clean.

east.description: An open path leads to The Great Door

down.description: An open path leads to The Base Of The Web

6392.name: The Great Door
6392.description:
ahead see a large, web-like door. Various designs of ancient runes and
names of Midgaard heroes are etched into the webwork. Perhaps lists of
victims? You can't tell. The air is fresh and clean. Wildflowers dot the
landscape.

north.description: An open path leads to The Lair Of Arachnos

west.description: An open path leads to The Sticky Chamber

6399.name: The Lair Of Arachnos
6399.description:
This is the lair of the Empress Spider, Arachnos. Visible is a lavishly
adorned rainbow web, her lair allows her to move to any universe she
wishes by using her magical strands to the Prime Material Plane. Coffers
upon coffers of gold, magical jewels and gems await. Unfortunately
Arachnos is a baggy spider too, and webs all her treasures to her
beautiful silken body. The air is fresh and clean. The open sky
stretches overhead.

south.description: An open path leads to The Great Door

6301.name: spider
6301.long_desc: The young spider is ballooning by you.
6301.description:
He looks freshly hatched and sprightly.  His young fangs are just
growing in as of late.

6302.name: yevaud
6302.long_desc: Yevaud, the Usurper of Midgaard is here, grinning evilly at you.
6302.description: Old, scaly, but still with a lot of bite in him left.

6303.name: spider
6303.long_desc: The wolf spider is here, licking its bloody fangs.
6303.description: The wolf spider is hairy, very hairy.

6304.name: orc
6304.long_desc: The orc is stuck in the web and he can't get out.
6304.description:
You notice an evil look in his eyes, but he seems quite drained of life,
and all he can do is glare at you while he's stuck in this web.

6305.name: wasp
6305.long_desc: The queen wasp is here, thinking how tasty you look.
6305.description: You notice a glazed look in her eyes.

6306.name: spider
6306.long_desc: A drone spider walks around doing its master's bidding.

6307.name: spider
6307.long_desc: An ethereal spider strides here, traveling to different worlds.
6307.description:
She winks in and out of reality.  It looks like it'd be difficult to hit her
without a magical weapon.

6308.name: slave
6308.long_desc: A human slave of Arachnos works here relentlessly.
6308.description:
The slave does not mind you, but will fight like a warrior if attacked.
He serves the spider Empress, Arachnos, though whether it is by choice
or because he was beguiled, you are not fully certain.

6309.name: quasit
6309.long_desc: A quasit blinks in and out, grinning at you.
6309.description:
Demoniac in nature, but more mischievous.  He twiddles his thumbs
and creates a magical treasure!

6310.name: spider
6310.long_desc: The bird spider snaps its powerful jaws.
6310.description: The Bird Spider has very powerful jaws.

6311.name: hermit
6311.long_desc: The hermit sits here and warns, 'Go back before it is too late!'
6311.description:
A dishevelled veteran warrior in disguise is what he is, but he
means well.

6312.name: donjonkeeper
6312.long_desc: The Donjonkeeper eyes you and wonders how pure your soul is.
6312.description:
He delves deeper into you as you stare at him.  Only those free of taint
will be allowed to remain here safely.

6313.name: guardian
6313.long_desc: The guardian is obviously not doing his job.
6313.description: He looks like a lazy bum who sleeps half the time.

6314.name: the Spider Queen
6314.long_desc: A colossal spider queen lurks amid a throne of webs.
6314.description:
She is a very attractive spider with an ornate gown.  She tempts you
into being one of her many slaves.  She does not possess the venomous
fangs of normal spiders, but then, as you realize, she does not need
them.

phases.message: The Spider Queen screeches and egg sacs split!
The Spider Queen thrashes, exposing her underside!

abilities.name: Web Trap
abilities.telegraph: The Spider Queen lifts her forelegs, webbing the air!

abilities.name: Poison Spit
abilities.telegraph: The Spider Queen gurgles, venom pooling in her maw!

6315.name: ki-rin
6315.long_desc: The Ki-Rin smiles good-naturedly to you.
6315.description:
She is the last bastion of good in this realm.  Her mission is to
someday free the slaves of the Empress.  She has been trapped here for
time eternal, and now the evil power of Arachnos feeds upon her intense
magical energies.  She will never give up here fight against evil,
though, and will continue her work in whatever manner presents itself.

6316.name: dragon
6316.long_desc: A wormkin with no teeth plays here.
6316.description: It is a rather small dragon, and you almost feel sad about killing it.

6317.name: dragon
6317.long_desc: A wormkin that has grown a bit stares at you inquisitively.
6317.description:
A medium-sized dragon -- seems it hasn't killed anything yet by itself, 
though there is a first time for everything...

6300.name: key
6300.room_desc: A somewhat plain black key has been left here.

6301.name: knife
6301.room_desc: A very sharp knife lies here.

6302.name: hat
6302.room_desc: A blue wizard's hat lies here.

6303.name: headress
6303.room_desc: A white cone-shaped head ornament with religious symbols lies here.

6305.name: potion
6305.room_desc: A thick white potion has been left here.

6306.name: a silken mantle
6306.room_desc: A mantle woven from spider silk lies here.

6307.name: a venom-laced stinger
6307.room_desc: A wicked stinger dripping venom rests here.

6308.name: a broodmother idol
6308.room_desc: A small idol of a spider queen lies here.
